tasks.context: Replace JSON file storage with better-sqlite3 for production scalability. Current JSON implementation limited to 1000 entries. SQLite needed for millions of history entries with indexed search.

tasks.title: Fix URL Bar Not Updating on Navigation
tasks.context: URL bar shows old URL (e.g., google.com) after clicking links to navigate to new pages. Fixed by syncing renderer <webview> state to main process via IPC.

tasks.title: Fix Suggestion Dropdown Persisting After Navigation
tasks.context: Suggestions remained open when manually typing a URL/search and pressing Enter, due to late-arriving async fetch results. Fixed by checking input focus before showing results.

tasks.title: Implement Aggressive Ad & Popup Blocking for Streaming Sites
tasks.context: Block popups and new tabs on streaming sites (football matches) using ad blocker engine logic. Similar to Brave's aggressive blocking. Intercepts window.open via setWindowOpenHandler.

tasks.title: Fix YouTube Reload Loop & Stabilize Ad Blocker
tasks.context: Video reload loop caused by duplicate IPC handler registration crashing the app when opening tabs/switching focus. Fixed by sharing webview session (partition) and checking initialization status. Restricted ad blocker to single session to prevent global IPC conflicts.

tasks.title: Implement Arc-style Sidebar with Realms & Docks
tasks.context: Transform the flat tab list into a hierarchical organization system inspired by Arc browser. Implement 'Realms' (workspaces like Work, Gaming, Hobbies) containing 'Docks' (collapsible groups of related tabs). Support loose tabs outside docks, swipe/navigation to switch realms, and full persistence. Production-grade implementation with no mocks or hardcoded data.

subtasks.title: Design & Create Data Models
subtasks.context: Define TypeScript interfaces for Realm, Dock, and enhanced Tab structures. Realms contain Docks and loose tabs. Docks contain tabs and have collapsed state. Each entity needs unique IDs, names, colors/icons, ordering, and timestamps.
